title: Chapter 184
body:
Chapter 184


Zhao Hao was a bit annoyed that the female live streamer ignored him.


Zhao Hao was used to the feeling of being idolized on Douyu, no matter which live broadcast room he enters. He felt like the emperor of all Douyu Streamers. The live streamers were all slaves to please him, and the audiences were merely his people.


But what could he do? This female live streamer is also a tycoon. She was not lacking in money. He couldn’t do a thing if she doesn’t want to open her webcam.


Therefore, it is said that be it within the literary industry or the live-stream industry, those who do not bow towards money are most annoying. No one would understand the desires and thoughts of such individuals!


What Zhao Youyue really wanted was an existence of her own, she wanted acknowledgment. This was a place for Xiao Yu to enjoy herself showing off and making herself matter in this world. However, she rarely ever live-streamed as ‘herself’.


She did not expect her calm, soothing style to draw in so many more viewers, compared to Xiao Yu’s non-stop blabbering style.


Now, the subscribers of her live broadcast room had almost reached 200,000!


At this moment, Zhao Hao had a move in mind. He first gave this female live streamer a helicopter, and sent another popup, saying, “Do you think I was just kidding with my 10 helicopters gift? Obviously not! I’ve given you one as proof. Hurry open your webcam; there’s 9 more!”


This one helicopter by Zhao Hao had increased the popularity of this live broadcast room even more. Many commenters came to grab the treasure box that would appear after each helicopter is given. But after they entered the room, they felt reluctant to leave, because they heard a very melodious violin sound…


After Zhao Youyue asked the commenters within the room to suggest some songs, some of them quoted some pop music, such as songs by Joker Xue[1].


Zhao Youyue felt that it was such a waste that there were no Jay Chous[2] in this world. She loved his songs the most, especially the ones that incorporated classical, Chinese orchestra.


Zhao Youyue had come well-prepared. She started to play the tune on her violin.


To most people, they would hardly feel anything from listening to hard, classical violin pieces. Instead, they preferred the melody of songs that they were familiar with, as long as they are played fluently.


Zhao Youyue’s skill with the violin was not just fluent, but it also had depth and emotion, although it could not be compared with ‘Chu Luoxun”s.


When she plays as ‘Chu Luoxun,’ she would utilize the maxed music talent stat to do many things. For instance, she would rearrange the music score of the iconic songs that existed in reality, or within her mind into full-on, proper violin melodies.


This was not something that could be done by anyone. ‘Chu Luoxun’ is able to perfectly rearrange pop music into violin melodies, without anything being off. This is ‘Chu Luoxun,’ a girl blessed by the God of music.


But of course, she was still mortal.


There were also benefits for being mortal. Zhao Youyue could perfectly inherit everything from her.


Previously, Zhao Youyue assumed that she might not be able to use the ability of the high energy level character cards. This was actually all based on her own assumptions.


After all, she had not yet obtained such a character card. She seemed to be assuming things scientifically, forgetting that her very own ‘Two Dimensional Gate’ was a very unscientific existence.


Therefore, not everything could be simply concluded, before she actually obtains a high energy level character card.


There was also merits within her idea of ‘being self-reliant’ – ‘not relying on the character cards.’ Since she was able to master ‘Xu Jing’ and ‘Yu Shengfan”s abilities by her own efforts, this meant that she could apply science into analyzing the ‘superpower’ stuff. As long as the analysis is thorough, she might even be able to manifest those superpowers in reality.


‘Two Dimensional Gate’ is truly a fascinating existence. You will never know what surprises you can get, until you arrive at the location and survey the scenery there yourself!


Zhao Youyue devotedly played “Ambiguous Relationship” by Joker Xue. It was quite a feat for anyone to play this song with the violin. After recognizing the familiar melody, many commenters sent popups praising her——


“Xiao Yu is truly 666, she is so versatile, to be able to play the violin so well!”


“Ah Yu, this must be your own rearrangement, right? I’m truly convinced. It’s really nice!”


“This must be a 10th-grade level violinist, right? By the way, is 10th grade the highest grade for violin? But then, even those full graded violinists can never play the violin this well. I truly worship Ah Yu…”


“Surprise appearance of a violin expert on Douyu! How about a song by Hiroyuki Sawano next?”


“Who’s Hiroyuki Sawano?” Must be some kind of anime gibberish that only fat otakus will listen to! Hehehe…”


“Any problem being a ‘fat otaku’?”


…


Zhao Youyue immediately accepted the excellent suggestion. She played the song “MKaliez” and “” [3] by Hiroyuki Sawano. She even managed to re-enact the Sawano-style pauses with her violin perfectly. The commenters who loved 2D stuff praised her, “It’s too awesome! Too nice!”


Right at that moment, be it Zhao Youyue or the commenters, everyone had totally forgotten about ‘Boss Hao’ who had planned to establish his own existence by spamming helicopters. This situation left Zhao Hao very embarrassed.


But after he descended into the world of this female live streamer’s melody, that embarrassment was quickly lost. Instead, he continued spamming the helicopters, one after another. This was because he truly admired her talent, and he just happened to have no other place to spend his money.


He decided to investigate the true identity of this female live streamer. He wanted to see who she actually was.


When he noticed that she was yet not contracted, he felt even more helpless. Then he expressed his anger, “Is Douyu blind? Why didn’t they sign a contract with such a talented female live streamer?”


“What on earth is wrong with those Douyu officials? Why don’t they sign a contract with such a female live streamer, one who totally has the potential to make herself famous throughout the whole of Douyu? Do they want to leave her to the other competitors?”


Zhao Hao used the helicopters to release his dissatisfaction, while making Zhao Youyue’s live broadcast room shot up the ranks!


Many audiences treated her as a talent-type live streamer. They did not know that she was even more incredible when it comes to playing games…


Ye Hai, whose pen name was ‘Leaves Fallen on the Sea,’ heaved a sigh of relief. This female live streamer’s previous live broadcasts were only cosplaying Yu Shengfan. She was in her normal condition today. Previously, he thought that he had gone completely crazy, thinking that Yu Shengfan had traveled into reality!


He continued spamming a few helicopters within the live broadcast room in order to suppress his surprise. Since he was now a Platinum writer, he had grown rather wealthy! He had the capital to get addicted to female live streamers…


Translation Note:


1.Joker Xue Joker Xue, formerly known as Jacky Xue, is a Chinese singer, comedian, record producer, actor, and television host.


2.Jay Chou Jay Chou is a famous Taiwanese musician, singer, songwriter, record producer, film producer, actor, and director.


3.”MKaliez” and “””MKaliez” is the IN(interlude) of a Japanese anime called “Aldnoah Zero”, where as “” is the IN of another anime called “Guilty Crown”. Both INs are composed by Hiroyuki Sawano.
